name: Cosmic Mayhem
description:
Ready for some in-your-face space action? Cosmic Mayhem awaits! Blast your way through endless waves of alien ships in this addictive space shooter from Earbeard Games.

Credits:

  • Game Designer: Shelby Gray
  • Composer: John Matos
  • Sound Designer: Nicholas Colella
  • Technical Sound Designer: Eric Berzins
